title: SoC THEATRE 312-1-21 The Art of Storytelling I

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course is designed for students eager to explore the potential of storytelling in their lives and their work. The course will examine the current renaissance of the art of storytelling, and will empower the participants to discover their own distinct voices, as they become tellers of stories. The class is experiential by nature with the student developing 4 stories during the course of the quarter.
